text:
Hi Team,
Tried integrating various versions of HubSpot to support current version of angular and typescript but no version is being supported. Followed documentation of <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs> to integrate HubSpot with angular. Installed <https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client in code and found many run time issues related to version compatibility
 
We are currently using Angular 8.2.6 and Typescript 3.5.3 in our application. Below is the run time error.
 
Could you please check below run time error. ~~~~~~~~
 
node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/events/api/eventsApi.d.ts:38:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 38 set accessToken(token: string); ~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/publicSmtpTokensApi.d.ts:33:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 33 set useQuerystring(value: boolean); ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/publicSmtpTokensApi.d.ts:34:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 34 set basePath(basePath: string); ~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/publicSmtpTokensApi.d.ts:35:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 35 set defaultHeaders(defaultHeaders: any); ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/publicSmtpTokensApi.d.ts:36:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 36 get defaultHeaders(): any; ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/publicSmtpTokensApi.d.ts:37:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 37 get basePath(): string; ~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/publicSmtpTokensApi.d.ts:400m:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 40 set accessToken(token: string); ~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/singleSendApi.d.ts:32:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 32 set useQuerystring(value: boolean); ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/singleSendApi.d.ts:33:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 33 set basePath(basePath: string); ~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/singleSendApi.d.ts:34:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 34 set defaultHeaders(defaultHeaders: any); ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/singleSendApi.d.ts:35:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context. 35 get defaultHeaders(): any; ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ node_modules/<https://twitter.com/HubSpot|@HubSpot>/api-client/lib/codegen/marketing/transactional/api/singleSendApi.d.ts:36:9 - error TS1086: An accessor cannot be declared in an ambient context.
